snippet: Two days after a firebomb attack on a Shiite Muslim mosque in Brussels killed a local imam, police remained uncertain of the suspect’s identity and local Muslims were baffled about his motives.
abstract: Police in Brussels remain uncertain of suspect's identity after firebomb attack on a Shiite Muslim mosque, killing a local imam; local Muslims are baffled about his motives.
lead_paragraph: Two days after a firebomb attack on a Shiite Muslim mosque in Brussels killed a local imam, police remained uncertain of the suspect’s identity and local Muslims were baffled about his motives.
